meanings.sent1: The congratulator smiled and shook hands with the winner.
meanings.sent2: The school principal was the official congratulator at the graduation ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The congratulator high-fived everyone in the room, spreading happiness.
meanings.sent4: She was like a walking congratulator, always ready to celebrate others' successes.
meanings.sent5: The congratulator's presence made the event feel even more special.

meanings.definition: To express pleasure or joy to someone for an achievement or good fortune.
meanings.sent1: I congratulated my friend on winning the race.
meanings.sent2: The team congratulated each other on a job well done.
meanings.sent3: The cat congratulated itself after catching the mouse.
meanings.sent4: Her smile congratulated the newlyweds better than any words could.
meanings.sent5: The sun congratulated the flowers by shining brightly on them.
